glsa.title: file: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in file, the worst of which could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: file is a utility that guesses a file format by scanning binary data for patterns.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in file. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user or automated system to process a specially crafted input file, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, a Denial of Service condition or have other unspecified impacts.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All file users should upgrade to the latest version:
